
Usage: app [-o] ARG

Longer App Desc
                
Arguments:      
  ARG           Argument
                Description
                Multiple
                Lines
                
Options:        
  -o, --opt     Option
                does something
                another line (env $XXX_TEST) (default "default")
  -f, --force   Force
                does something
                another line (env $YYY_TEST)
